main event: A RAAF officer and his son reported witnessing a bright white object that turned green and burned out in a line of orange sparks in Australia.
interesting points: The object transitioned from bright white to brighter green before burning out with orange sparks., The sighting occurred under light cloud cover, making it difficult to determine the exact location of the burnout., The object was traveling south at high speed, approximately 22 degrees above the horizon., Press reports indicated that many people in the Brisbane area reported similar sightings., The sighting lasted for about 3 minutes.
sighted object: a bright white object that changed color
